headline: Haitian President Jovenel Moise Assassinated Home
summary: On Wednesday, Haitian President Jovenel Moise was assassinated at his home by unidentified attackers.Moise had been governing by decree in Haiti, since the country had not held an election for more than two years.  General elections are scheduled to be held later in 2021 as Haiti continues to face worsening poverty and political instability.
